Mueller, R. (2018, July 13). Indictment - United States of America vs. VIKTOR BORISOVICH NETYKSHO, et al. Retrieved September 13, 2018.

external_references.source_name: Cybersecurity Advisory GRU Brute Force Campaign July 2021
external_references.description: NSA, CISA, FBI, NCSC. (2021, July). Russian GRU Conducting Global Brute Force Campaign to Compromise Enterprise and Cloud Environments. Retrieved July 26, 2021.

objects.description: [APT28](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0007) regularly deploys both publicly available (ex: [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002)) and custom password retrieval tools on victims.(Citation: ESET Sednit Part 2)(Citation: DOJ GRU Indictment Jul 2018) They have also dumped the LSASS process memory using the MiniDump function.(Citation: Cybersecurity Advisory GRU Brute Force Campaign July 2021)
